title: The Secret Circus
description: THE GREATEST little show ON EARTHThe secrets of Paris revealed from the ground up.Beneath the sparkling lights of Paris is a circus so secret that only the mice know how to find it. Floating by balloon across a Parisian cityscape they travel to the grand performance, where tiny acrobats form mouse pyramids and giant housecats are tamed. Wright's simple expressive lines over glowing textures make this a captivating and adorable book debut, not to mention one great show.
author: Johanna Wright
